meta.description: Optimize the number of pop and R&B concerts to minimize the total number of concerts while meeting audience and practice constraints.

sets.name: CONCERT_TYPES
sets.description: Types of concerts the singer can hold.

params.name: audience
params.description: Audience members brought in by each type of concert.

params.name: practice_days
params.description: Days of practice required for each type of concert.

vars.name: num_concerts
vars.description: Number of concerts of each type.

objective.name: min_total_concerts
objective.description: Minimize the total number of concerts.

constraints.name: audience_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least 10000 audience members are brought in.

constraints.name: practice_days_limit
constraints.description: Ensure practice days do not exceed 180.

constraints.name: R&B_concert_ratio
constraints.description: R&B concerts must be at most 40% of total concerts.
